SUMMARY: Members of Rise Up 4 Abortion Rights protested outside of Supreme Court Justice Amy Coney Barrett's home in Virginia demanding "abortion on demand and without apology."

TITLE: Number of Americans who think the US has poor moral values hits record high: Poll
SUMMARY: A Gallup poll found that half of Americans rate the US as having poor moral values, while only one percent said that the country's moral values are excellent.

TITLE: Third suspect charged in Chicago mass shooting at McDonald’s near Magnificent Mile
SUMMARY: Chicago police say a 17-year-old turned himself in on a gun offense, making him the third suspect arrested following a mass shooting at a McDonald’s near Magnificent Mile last month.

TITLE: Wisconsin mom says school district threatening legal action to 'bully' her criticism to silence
SUMMARY: A Wisconsin mom said that the Oconomowoc School District is trying to bully her into silence by threatening legal action for her critical statements.

TITLE: Texas drive-by shooting at family BBQ leaves 2 dead, 5 wounded: police
SUMMARY: Two men were killed and five other victims were wounded after a suspect drove by a family barbeque in San Antonio and unloaded multiple rounds, authorities said.

TITLE: Hundreds gather for vigil remembering two California police officers killed in shootout
SUMMARY: A vigil was held in El Monte, California, honoring fallen officers Michael Paredes and Joseph Santana, who died following a shootout in the Los Angeles County city.

TITLE: Number of Americans who believe in God drops to historic low: Poll
SUMMARY: The number of Americans who believe in God is at the lowest in nearly seven decades, as Gallup notes religiosity is a major factor in US political divisions.
